song_lyrics: Pramukh swarūpe avtaryā, adhalak dhalyā chho āj.
Shrījī pragaṭ chhe re, sadā satsangmā,
Karī mane Yogījīe sān, tāḷyu mārā antarnu agnān;
Ughaḍyā antarnā dvār, hu to thayo bhavjaḷthī pār;
Chitt have chonṭyu re, pragaṭ swarūpmā... 3
Chadhī mane kharī khumārī āj, mūkī me to lokḍiyānī lāj;
Rang mane lāgyo re, Nārāyaṇ nāmno... 4
Sāchu kahe chhe Harino dās, dharī antarmā hullās;
Have nishank thayo re, Nārāyaṇ swarūpmā... 5
title: Shrījī pragaṭ chhe re sadā satsangmā

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-1008: Sadhu Yagneshwardas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
